# Elixir of Hiding
## Overview
**Aura** faint illusion; **CL** 5th

**Slot** —

**Price** 250 gp

**Weight** —

**Description**

A character drinking this liquid gains an intuitive ability to sneak and hide (+10 competence bonus on [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks for 1 hour).

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Invisibility (Spell)|invisibility]]*

**Cost** 125 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 511
